2025.title: Getting Started With Zephyr
2025.description: Explains Zephyr Devicetrees and guides engineers through hardware-layer mapping for embedded projects.

2025.title: Better Hardware Design Decisions
2025.description: Introduces multidisciplinary design optimization for embedded hardware teams, leading to improved system trade-offs and faster development.

2025.title: Embedded Systems Roadmap
2025.description: Shares the logic, structure, and value of an engineering roadmap for embedded system learning and career growth.
